36.3. ma3_xmls_factory.main_cl module¶

Ma3 classes to create xml to timecode and sequence <https://www.gituhb.org/bozi6/>

class ma3_xmls_factory.main_cl.CreateMacroFromCsv(bemenet_file, seq_szam, projekt_nev)[source]¶

Bases: object

MA3 Macro createer Class from csv file

Paraméterek:

  • bemenet_file – input csv file

  • seq_szam – the number of generated sequence in sequence pool.

  • projekt_nev – The name of generated macro and sequence and timecode pool objects.

create_xml_macro()[source]¶

Create {projectname}_macro.xml file in destination folder

Visszatérés típusa:

Visszatérési érték:
